subject: Sailboats and Sailing
America's Cup
lead_paragraph: The America’s Cup challenger, BMW Oracle Racing, confirmed that BOR 90, the giant trimaran, is the boat it will use in its showdown against the defending champion Alinghi.
snippet: The America’s Cup challenger, BMW Oracle Racing, confirmed that BOR 90, the giant trimaran, is the boat it will use in its showdown against the defending champion Alinghi.
